2.1.3. Lab – Virtual Server¶

In this section, you will define the virtual server IP address its SSL profile settings

2.1.3.1. Task – Create a virtual server¶

  1. Click Show Advanced Setting located in the top right corner to expose the server-side SSL profile settings

  1. Enter the IP address 10.1.10.100
  2. Select acme.com-wildcard from the Client SSL certificate dropdown box
  3. Select acme.com-wild ard from the Associated Private Key dropdown box
  4. Select ca.f5lab.local from the Trusted Certificate Authorities for Client Authentication drop down box

  1. Select serverssl from the Server SSL Profile options
  2. Click Save & Next
